text: Salomão is a Portugese surname and given name. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). Notable people with the name include: == Given name == * (1880–1969), Brazilian priest * (born 1972), Lebanese footballer * (born 1995), Mozambican footballer * Salomon Kalou, Ivorian association football player == Surname == * (born 1988), Portuguese footballer * (born 1954), Mozambican economist * (1943–2003), Brazilian poet ==References==
title: Salomão
